item.title: Webpack
item.description: 概念1 At its core, webpack is a static module bundler for modern JavaScript applications. When webpack processes your application, it internally builds a dependency graph which maps every module your project needs and generates one or more bundles. 作用 在getting-started说得很清楚 传统的html
